mapper.select: select a.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select POSTNO, PARENTPOSTNO, lpad(' ', (level-1)*4, ' ') || POSTTITLE POSTTITLE, USERID, POSTWDATE, level from HIBOARD_POST a where BOARDNO = #{boardNo} start with PARENTPOSTNO is null connect by prior POSTNO = PARENTPOSTNO order SIBLINGS by POSTGN desc, POSTNO) a) a where rn between (#{page}-1)*#{pagesize}+1 and #{page}*#{pagesize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HIBOARD_POST VALUES(hiboard_post_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardno}, #{posttitle}, #{postcontent}, #{userid}, sysdate, 0, case when NVL(#{postgn},0) = 0 then hiboard_post_SEQ.currval else #{postgn} end, case when NVL(#{parentpostno},0) = 0 then NULL else #{parentpostno} end)
mapper.update: update HIBOARD_POST set DELETEYN = 1 where postno = #{postno}
update HIBOARD_POST set posttitle = #{posttitle}, postcontent = #{postcontent} where postno = #{postno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HIBOARD_POSTFILE VALUES(hiboard_postFile_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{filename}, #{realfilename}, case when NVL(#{postno},0) = 0 then hiboard_post_SEQ.CURRVAL else #{postno} end)
